# Installation
> `npm install --save @types/karma`

# Summary
This package contains type definitions for karma ( https://github.com/karma-runner/karma ).

# Details
Files were exported from https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/tree/master/types/karma/v1

Additional Details
 * Last updated: Fri, 24 May 2019 21:00:59 GMT
 * Dependencies: @types/bluebird, @types/node
 * Global values: none
